The character of cruelty in the workers of iniquity ; and, Cure of contention among the people of God held forth in two sermons preached in the day of publick humiliation upon occasion of the late sad persecution in Piedmont / by Faithful Teate. Teate, Faithful, b. 1621. Teate, Faithful, b. 1621. Cure of contention among the people of God.
[20], 152, [3] p.
Printed for George Sawbridge, London : 1656.
"The cure of contention among the people of God": p.71-152 has special t.p. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
